## isArray() function

Test whether a given value is an array

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function isArray(testValue: unknown): testValue is any[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  testValue | unknown | a value to test |

<b>Returns:</b>

testValue is any\[\]
